article.headline: European stocks open lower after news Trump has contracted COVID-19
article.body: European stocks opened lower Friday after the news U.S. President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump contracted COVID-19. The Stoxx Europe 600 SXXP, +0.55% dropped 0.8%. Airplane maker Airbus AIR, -0.20% fell over 2%, and industrial gasses firm Linde LIN, +0.14% also dropped 2%. Futures on the Dow Jones Industrial Average YM00, +0.82% fell 303 points.
